page.title: 18JAMES BARR GARAGE SANDON
page.content: The garage does not sell cars now,but it repairs and services Renault cars.Each day they have between three to ten cars to be serviced or repaired.The number is dependent on the time it takes to do the job.There is a large spare part section.They have in stock about 34 thousand different parts.Usually each day about a thousand pounds worth of goods are sold, either over the counter or to other garages.Four people work in the spare part section and also there are two car mechanics, a manager and a secretary.All the spares are listed on computer sheets and they know exactly how many parts were sold for any time of the year.The computer also suggests which parts should be re-ordered.
